summary: 'The ealih hazards of Labour MP_ tor stoke on. The Times' front page on July 28, 1982: 'Disagreement over the terrifyingrisks of asbestos' 'The Mail on Sunday' on the same day was published with a front-page story on 'Labour MP's asbestos hazards'
